translation.en: [crowd chanting] Santi! Santi!
Santi! Santi! Santi!
[announcer] Yo, Miami!
On the first leg of his world tour,
make some noise, y'all!
It's Santi!
Absolutely, so heavy.
-Honestly, the heaviest. -I couldn't have done it
translation.fr: - Du très lourd.- J'aurais pas réussi

translation.en: -without my corillo! -[phone vibrates]
-Yo, Daddy Yankee! Dímelo, hermano. -[Daddy Yankee] Santi.
-You're a star. -[girls tittering]
-Hey, I gotta call you right back. -Dale, papi.
translation.fr: Je te rappelle tout de suite.

translation.en: Santi, we love you so much.
Let's all have sex,
together.
Santi, you can't. It's time.
Time for what?
You ladies can head back with me.
-It's time. Come on. -Ness!
What? We can share!
-We gotta go. We gotta go. Come on. -No.
Come on, Santi, wake up.
-Wake up. -[groaning]
-Wake up. It's time. -Bro, wake up.
-You don't wanna miss this. -Oh, I had the craziest dream.
translation.fr: - Tu vas rater ça.- J'ai fait un rêve de dingue.

translation.en: Tell me everything before we forget.
-Why do you guys do this? -[Felix] Ness,
I'm this young man's creative director,
and dreams are a creative director's clay, if you will.
translation.fr: et ses rêves sont comme de l'argile.Si tu permets.

translation.en: -Do you will? -What?
-Do you will? -Okay, Felix,
as this young man's manager, shut the fuck up
translation.fr: en tant qu'agente,je te demande de la fermer

translation.en: and find a gas station like I've asked you to do.
-Yes, sorry. -Guys, we're so blessed.
I mean, we're moving to Miami. Like, this is it.
Oh, my God, not this again.
I gotta get you there in under an hour,
to give us enough time to move into the apartment, to eat,
translation.fr: on aura assez de tempspour emménager, manger

translation.en: and get at least eight hours of beauty sleep
before the label meeting--
-Shit! -[man] …with his viral hit,
-with over six million views and counting… -[screams]
translation.fr: avec plus de six millions de vues,

translation.en: -…"Exagerao," by Fort Myers' own, Santi. -[cheering]
-Let's go! -Hey, bro, you're on the radio!
translation.fr: - Ouais !- Tu passes à la radio !

translation.en: -["Exagerao" playing] -I'm starstruck.
Guys, this is it. This is destiny!
translation.fr: Les gars, on y est.C'est le destin !

translation.en: It feels so good to finally not be a tourist in Miami.
translation.fr: Ça fait du biende plus être un touriste à Miami.

translation.en: -[Ness laughs] -Miami.
Oh, this is gonna be great.
-This is gonna be so great! -I--
Yo, we've been here five minutes, already seen your cousin Sebastian's ads.
translation.fr: On tombe déjà sur une pub de ton cousin. LIPOFILLING RATÉ ? APPELEZ SEBASTIANEMMENEZ VOS FESSES AU TRIBUNAL

translation.en: He must be killing it with all the fucked-up BBLs here.
translation.fr: Il doit faire un malheur, par ici.

translation.en: A botched BBL wouldn't be a dealbreaker for me.
translation.fr: Des fesses ratées, ça me dérange pas.

translation.en: It's like getting a discount on bruised fruit.
translation.fr: C'est comme une réducsur les fruits abîmés.

translation.en: Still tastes the same.
[in Spanish] Should we take him out of the group?
But he's the best at what he does.
I know, I hate it.
[in English] Don't be bullies, cabrones.
-We're not bullying you. -I can tell by your tone.
translation.fr: - On te tyrannise pas.- Ça s'entend au ton.

translation.en: Yo, did… Did Mia's assistant confirm for tomorrow?
translation.fr: L'assistant de Mia a confirmépour demain ?

translation.en: Yeah. We're good. 11:30.
Yes! And she knows that all three of us are coming?
translation.fr: Et elle sait qu'on vient tous les trois ?

translation.en: Just 'cause I don't have any experience,
doesn't mean I don't know what I'm doing.
translation.fr: mais je sais ce que je fais.

translation.en: That's what that means. -[phone beeps] -[Santi] What?
"Thinking of the kids suffering in Africa and countries around the world."
translation.fr: "Je pense aux enfants qui souffrenten Afrique et ailleurs.

translation.en: "I do this for y'all."
You have alerts on for Javier Luna's Instagram?
translation.fr: T'as les alertesde Javier Luna sur Insta ?

translation.en: You being jealous of Javier Luna, one of my favorites.
translation.fr: J'adore l'idée que tu sois jaloux de lui.

translation.en: Also, his origin story is very fascinating.
I'm not jealous of Javier. I'm just asking why does he have his alerts on?
translation.fr: Je suis pas jaloux,je demande pourquoi il a ses alertes.

translation.en: I don't get why people compare us.
That guy is like a reggaeton Machine Gun Kelly.
translation.fr: C'est le Machine Gun Kelly du reggaeton.

translation.en: He doesn't even write his own music.
What's wrong with MGK?
You at least have alerts on for my page, right?
translation.fr: Tu as activé les alertes pour ma page ?

translation.en: Yeah.
How are you in charge of my social media page
but you only have alerts on for Javier Luna and not me?
translation.fr: et t'as les alertes de Javier,mais pas les miennes ?

translation.en: Why do I need to have alerts on? I post things. I'm the alert.
translation.fr: Pas besoin, je les poste.L'alerte, c'est moi.

translation.en: This is why I should be in charge of socials.
translation.fr: C'est pour çaque je devrais m'en occuper.

translation.en: -You in charge of socials? -Yeah.
-Ness, you have two friends. -Yeah, so do you.
translation.fr: - Tu as deux amis.- Oui, comme toi.

translation.en: Who do you want running your Instagram?
translation.fr: Santi, qui doit gérer ton Insta ?

translation.en: Yo, Africa's not even a country.
It isn't, right?
-[Irma] There it is. This is it. -Ness.
[chuckling] This is not what was in the photos.
translation.fr: C'est pas du tout comme sur les photos.

translation.en: Relax, I got this.
This is not what was in the photos.
translation.fr: C'est pas comme sur les photos.

translation.en: I know, but the pictures are old, very old.
translation.fr: Je sais, les photos sont très vieilles.

translation.en: I had it updated since.
Right.
Did anybody die in here?
I'm definitely feeling someone's ancestors.
It's not what we thought.
But this place is fine. It comes furnished, I mean…
translation.fr: mais c'est bien.Il est meublé, donc…

translation.en: It works.
Given this was a bait and switch,
obviously, we're gonna need some sort of discount.
translation.fr: donc on va exiger une remise.

translation.en: There's gonna be an extra charge for the furniture.
translation.fr: Tous les meubles sont en supplément.

translation.en: That's the opposite of what I said.
translation.fr: C'est l'inverse de ce que je dis.

translation.en: Keep negotiating. You're doing great.
Extra. It has to be extra,
'cause I have to cover the furniture rental, the lease.
translation.fr: je paie pour la locationdes meubles, le bail,

translation.en: I have to pay for the beds, the couch, the table, the spoons.
translation.fr: pour les lits, le canapé,la table, les cuillères.

translation.en: -Spoons? -[Santi] Look.
Even with the extra, guys, I mean, this is fine. We're…
translation.fr: Même avec le supplément, c'est pas mal.On est…

translation.en: We're in. It's a great deal.
Let's make it happen.
-It's a deal. -Perfect.
Eh, mmm, we'll take care of the paperwork.
It's gonna be two days to process and then you are in.
translation.fr: Ça prendra deux jours,puis vous pourrez emménager.

translation.en: I thought that we were moving in today.
No, no, I didn't say today. I say two-day.
-No, but we need to be in today. -No.
Can we please find another place?
translation.fr: On peut trouver un autre appart ?

translation.en: Not that wouldn't blow our budget.
Okay, is there any way
translation.fr: Est-ce qu'on pourrait trouver une solution

translation.en: that we can move in, maybe later this afternoon or maybe tonight?
translation.fr: pour emménager cet après-midi,ou même ce soir ?

translation.en: Because we don't have anywhere else to go.
translation.fr: On n'a nulle part où aller.

translation.en: No.
I feel like you didn't even think about that. You just said "no," real quick.
translation.fr: Vous avez même pas réfléchi.Vous avez dit "non" tout de suite.

translation.en: -No. -That was the same speed.
No. Two days.
Come on, mami?
-Two days. -Two days.
Guys, it's really not that big of a deal.
translation.fr: Les gars, c'est pas si grave.

translation.en: We can get a motel until the place is ready.
translation.fr: On peut aller au motel en attendant.

translation.en: I mean, that's one option, but also it's kind of not.
translation.fr: C'est une option,mais en fait, pas vraiment.

translation.en: Why?
We're already spending way more than I thought on furniture,
translation.fr: On va dépenser plus que prévu en meubles,

translation.en: and other than the money I set aside for studio time,
translation.fr: et à part l'argentpour les séances au studio,

translation.en: we don't have extra.
We start spending, we start losing.
translation.fr: Si on dépense, on perd de l'argent.

translation.en: A motel means we lose, I don't know, a bed.
translation.fr: Avec un motel, on perd un lit.

translation.en: Or spoons.
What about Sebastian? I bet his place is sick,
translation.fr: Et Sebastian ?Son appart doit être mortel

translation.en: he's got that botched Brazilian booty bread.
Dude, there's no way that I'm calling Sebby.
That's admitting defeat before we even start.
He wants to help. He even offered you a job.
translation.fr: Il veut t'aider.Il t'a même offert un job.

translation.en: If I call him, he's gonna call my dad, and start talking shit,
translation.fr: Si je l'appelle,il appellera mon père pour bitcher,

translation.en: then my dad will call my tías and tíos
translation.fr: et papa appellera mes tías et tíos

translation.en: and say that I should've fucking taken an office job just like them.
translation.fr: pour dire que j'aurais dûprendre un job dans un bureau.

translation.en: I don't want Sebby to know that I'm here.
translation.fr: Sebby doit pas savoir que je suis là.

translation.en: So, what are we gonna do? I vote that we go back home.
translation.fr: On fait quoi, alors ?Je vote pour qu'on rentre.

translation.en: No. [sighs]
If we start driving back,
translation.fr: Si on se met en route,

translation.en: we can make it back in a couple of hours, beat traffic.
translation.fr: on y sera dans deux heures,sans bouchons.

translation.en: [Santi] Big meeting tomorrow. Get some sleep.
translation.fr: Le RDV important est demain.Dormez bien.

translation.en: Everybody good?
[Ness] Yes, perfect. I love this.
Ness, you're tall. Wouldn't you rather be somewhere spacious,
translation.fr: Ness, t'es grande,t'aurais pas plus de place

translation.en: like the trunk, or the undercarriage?
translation.fr: dans le coffre ou sous la voiture ?

translation.en: Ow, what the fuck?
Santi, were you trying to fuck the landlady earlier?
Damn it.
-[Felix] Come on, park. -[Ness] We gotta move, we're running late.
translation.fr: - Allez, gare-toi.- On est en retard.

translation.en: [Felix] All right, hurry up.
Do you really need your fucking backpack?
translation.fr: T'as besoin de ton sac à dos ?

translation.en: Guys, we only have ten minutes.
Ness, I can help you with your makeup.
translation.fr: Je peux t'aider à te maquiller.

translation.en: We're all looking a little tired from last night.
translation.fr: T'as l'air fatiguée après cette nuit.

translation.en: I did my makeup already.
-Oh, I'm sure it's fine then. -I could kill you.
translation.fr: - Ça ira, alors.- Je vais te tuer.

translation.en: So, look, when Mia asks us to sign this record deal,
translation.fr: Quand Mia nous demanderade signer le contrat,

translation.en: do I say yes right away?
Or do I pretend like I'm thinking about it, and then be like,
translation.fr: Ou je fais semblant de réfléchir,avant de dire :

translation.en: -"Yeah, we'll sign." -[Ness] Okay, no.
She's not offering us a record deal.
She might not even help us.
We have to prepare for everything.
translation.fr: On doit se préparer à tout.

translation.en: The only thing I'm preparing for
translation.fr: Je suis préparé à une chose :

translation.en: is filling our oceanfront balcony with hoes.
translation.fr: à inviter des pétasses sur notre balcon.

translation.en: Sorry, shouldn't have said that.
I'm trying new things. It's Miami.
Don't expect her to offer us anything.
If she did, that would be great. But we have a plan.
translation.fr: Si elle fait une offre, super,mais on a un plan.

translation.en: So remember the plan. We have this meeting,
we parlay that into other meetings,
then we network with DJ and industry types,
translation.fr: on contacte des DJet des responsables,

translation.en: spend a little money to promote on some playlists
translation.fr: on paiepour être sur les playlists

translation.en: once we figure out who's who,
build the hype, you record new music,
translation.fr: on attise le truc,tu fais du son,

translation.en: and then we start a bidding war between the record labels.
translation.fr: et on laisse les labels s'entretuerpour nous signer.

translation.en: Trust the plan.
So, trust the plan that has us
preparing for the meeting of our lives in a gas station bathroom?
translation.fr: à se préparer pour un RDV capitaldans une station-service ?

translation.en: That is what I am here for. Music, plans.
It's not coming to mind
-what you're here for. -I'm the creative director.
translation.fr: - de connaître ton rôle.- Directeur artistique.

translation.en: -The fuck? -[Ness] I don't really--
Stop it. We trust the plan, okay?
translation.fr: Arrêtez. On suit le plan, OK ?

translation.en: -That's why you're the captain. -Ya tú sabe.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que t'es capitaine.

translation.en: [in English] No.
Is this sensor or is it a switch?
translation.fr: C'est un capteur ou un bouton ?

translation.en: -Wait, wee bit higher. Up there. -No, hit it!
translation.fr: - Plus haut. Tout là-haut.- Non, tape !

translation.en: Don't hit it! Don't hit it!
Santi?
Ah, it's so good to finally meet you.
-It's a pleasure. -[Mia laughs]
-And you must be Ness. -Yes.
-Nice to meet you. -You, too.
You must be Felix. I love how you directed the video.
translation.fr: Tu dois être Felix.J'ai adoré ton clip.

translation.en: -It's a pleasure to finally connect. -Okay.
translation.fr: Ravi de vous voir en vrai.

translation.en: We can't believe that we're meeting with someone from the biggest
translation.fr: On est épatés de rencontrerune représentante du plus gros label

translation.en: -reggaeton label in the game. -Please.
-Come on, let's go find our table. -[Santi] Okay.
[softly] Calm down.
Okay, man, look, I just gotta say,
translation.fr: Écoute, il faut que je te dise,

translation.en: I am impressed with how you do it all.
I mean, you… You write, you produce, you perform.
translation.fr: Tu écris, tu produis, tu chantes.

translation.en: You know how rare that is in this space?
translation.fr: Tu sais à quel point c'est rare ?

translation.en: You have a real ear for it.
Oh, and the video?
Loved how y'all did the video.
-It was just-- -Thank you.
Of course.
Six million views is no joke.
translation.fr: Six millions de vues, c'est fou.

translation.en: I just love when people just go out there
translation.fr: J'adore quand les gens se lancent

translation.en: and figure shit out.
That's what you're supposed to do.
So, now, I have to ask, where do you see yourself going from here?
translation.fr: Il faut que je te demande :comment tu te vois évoluer ?

translation.en: I mean, well, this might sound kind of crazy to you, but I feel like
translation.fr: Ça va vous sembler dingue,mais je me vois devenir

translation.en: I can be the biggest reggaeton star in the world.
translation.fr: la plus grande star du reggaeton.

translation.en: Yeah, that doesn't sound crazy at all.
If you could call my parents and tell them,
translation.fr: Si vous pouviez dire ça à mes parents,

translation.en: that would be great.
Yeah, I'll do it after I call mine.
I'll do it right after I call mine.
You wanna be the biggest reggaeton star in the world.
translation.fr: Tu veux êtrela plus grande star du reggaeton.

translation.en: What's the next move?
Please tell me it's not that you moved here,
translation.fr: Pitié, ne me dis pas :"M'installer ici

translation.en: take a few meetings with some labels
and were hoping they'd climb over each other to… [laughing] …sign you.
translation.fr: "en espérantqu'ils se battent pour me signer."

translation.en: -No. -No.
Okay, good.
Of course not, no, um…
We have a really well-thought-out plan, and it's, uh, like, multifaceted.
translation.fr: On a un plan millimétré,plutôt complexe.

translation.en: I could explain it to you. It's just like--
-Eh, I got you. -Yeah.
It sounds intricate. I love that,
because not everybody has it figured out.
translation.fr: car tout le monde n'est pas préparé.

translation.en: See that guy there?
The waiter?
He's a musician, too.
He's really good.
We had a meeting here a couple months ago at this exact same table.
translation.fr: On a eu un RDV il y a deux moisà cette même table.

translation.en: But it didn't work out the way he wanted it to.
translation.fr: Mais ça n'a pas marché comme il voulait.

translation.en: So now, he's here bringing people sandwiches.
So you specifically picked this restaurant
just to, like, point out that guy's failures?
No. What I'm trying to tell you is, that's every restaurant here.
translation.fr: C'est pour vous direque c'est pareil dans tous les restos.

translation.en: That's the point.
I can't say this without sounding just a little bit slimy,
translation.fr: C'est difficile à diresans paraître hypocrite,

translation.en: but the music industry is tough.
There's so many things new artists don't even know they don't even know.
translation.fr: Tant de jeunes artistes ignorentqu'ils n'y connaissent rien.

translation.en: Market reports,
securing guest features and producers,
media promotions, tour scheduling. It's…
I say that to say we have people to do all that shit for you.
translation.fr: Je dis ça,car on est là pour le faire à ta place.

translation.en: All you worry about is make some good music.
translation.fr: Tu te concentres sur la musique.

translation.en: Great, that's what I do.
Plus, there's upfront money, too.
translation.fr: Et on te verse une avance.

translation.en: Yeah, there are a lot of uncertainties with being an independent artist.
translation.fr: Le métier d'artiste indépendantest plein d'incertitudes.

translation.en: But with being an independent artist, what you do know, uh,
translation.fr: Mais en tant qu'indépendant,une chose est sûre :

translation.en: is nothing happens without your say-so.
translation.fr: rien ne bouge sans notre accord.

translation.en: [chuckles] And I mean, yeah, that is a hell of a lot more work,
translation.fr: Et bien sûr,ça représente beaucoup de travail,

translation.en: but I don't see that as a bad thing.
translation.fr: mais c'est pas une mauvaise chose.

translation.en: Why would working harder be a bad thing, you know?
translation.fr: En quoi c'est mal de travailler plus dur ?

translation.en: Also, that is nothing to say of how whatever money you make
translation.fr: Sans parler de l'argent qu'on gagne,qui nous est

translation.en: goes directly to you.
Can't argue with that.
Oh, shit.
I'm so sorry,
Um, I actually have to go.
-Wait. [laughs] -[Mia] Shit.
You're leaving? Right now?
[Mia] Yeah, I'm sorry.
My, uh, label is throwing this huge beach club event tonight
translation.fr: Mon label organiseune grosse soirée sur la plage,

translation.en: and I have to call all the artists.
Sounds fun.
Yes, it will be. Thank you guys so much for lunch. This was great.
translation.fr: Oui. Merci pour le déjeuner.C'était super.

translation.en: Yes, hi. Uh-huh.
You cannot bring him.
She didn't offer us a deal. Didn't invite us to the party.
translation.fr: Pas de contrat,pas d'invitation à la soirée.

translation.en: Didn't even offer to pay for lunch.
translation.fr: Elle a même pas payé le resto.

translation.en: Don't do that.
All I'm saying is it feels a lot like
Mia showed up feeling one way about us
translation.fr: que Mia avait un avis sur nous,

translation.en: and then you started spraying your Ness mist everywhere,
translation.fr: mais la négativité de Nesss'est propagée partout,

translation.en: then she left feeling a different way.
translation.fr: et Mia est partie avec un autre avis.

translation.en: Who tells someone about a party, but doesn't invite them to it?
translation.fr: Qui te parle d'une fêtesans même t'y inviter ?

translation.en: Someone trying to send us a message.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un qui fait passer un message.

translation.en: Someone covered
-in Ness mist. -Stop saying that.
-It's gross. -For real,
what was going on back there? You started to go off script.
I'm the manager, right?
I have to make sure that we make smart decisions.
It didn't all the way feel like that.
translation.fr: C'est pas l'impression que j'ai eue.

translation.en: It felt like there was some subtext that Mia for sure noticed.
translation.fr: On aurait ditque Mia comprenait le sous-entendu.

translation.en: So you thought we had a good plan before, but now you don't?
translation.fr: Tu pensais que le plan était bon,et plus maintenant ?

translation.en: Diablo, it took one lunch meeting for you to trust somebody more than us.
translation.fr: Diablo, un seul RDV,et tu nous fais plus confiance.

translation.en: I did not mean it like that. I'm just saying that
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas dit ça.Ce que je dis,

translation.en: Mia, she started to say that our whole plan out here is shitty.
translation.fr: c'est que Mia a ditque notre plan est merdique.

translation.en: -That didn't set off bells in your head? -That's literally
translation.fr: - Ça t'a pas inquiétée ?- C'est exactement

translation.en: what they do, it's a power game. She wants us to think we need her.
translation.fr: ce qu'elle veut,qu'on pense qu'on a besoin d'elle.

translation.en: If I wasn't in this group, I would think it's hilarious
translation.fr: Si j'étais pas impliqué,je trouverais hilarant

translation.en: how fucked we are. It took us one lunch meeting
translation.fr: qu'on soit déjà foutus.En un RDV,

translation.en: for Ness to lose us our multimillion dollar record deal.
translation.fr: Ness a fait foirerun contrat à plusieurs millions.

translation.en: There was no deal!
There was a deal. And you fucked it!
translation.fr: Y en avait un, et tu l'as fait foirer !

translation.en: You know what? Fuck it.
We gotta go to this party.
-The one Mia didn't invite us to? -[Ness] Yeah.
translation.fr: - Alors qu'on n'est pas invités ?- Oui.

translation.en: We show her we're not some fucking loser wannabes.
translation.fr: On va lui montrerqu'on n'est pas des ratés.

translation.en: Ness, the three of us currently live in a 2009 Toyota Corolla.
translation.fr: Ness, on dort tous les troisdans une Toyota Corolla.

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. I'm gonna find that party and go there,
translation.fr: Je vais aller à cette soirée

translation.en: and I'm going to get "Exagerao" played there.
It won't be listed online.
It's an industry event, not a college job fair.
translation.fr: C'est une soirée pro,pas un salon étudiant.

translation.en: -Found it. -Oh.
How did you find that?
Went to the label's site, found an employee registry,
translation.fr: J'ai entré les noms des employés

translation.en: went to Instagram, looked for pictures, names.
translation.fr: trouvés sur le site du label sur Insta.

translation.en: Then I checked if anyone had posted it,
translation.fr: J'ai regardé qui en avait parlé,

translation.en: 'cause everybody posts everything.
translation.fr: car tout le monde parle en ligne.

translation.en: Wait.
Doesn't make sense.
It'll feel weird to show up there uninvited, like--
translation.fr: Ce sera gênant d'arriver sans invitation.

translation.en: No, it's a straight-up bad idea.
At best, Mia is on the fence about a deal.
translation.fr: Au mieux, Mia hésite à nous signer.

translation.en: If we show up to a party we're not even supposed to know about,
translation.fr: Si on s'incruste à une fête privée,

translation.en: she'll think we're stalking her.
-It'll ruin our chance. -No. We should go.
translation.fr: - Ça bousillera nos chances.- On y va.

translation.en: Picture it. We are at the beach. Industry big shots
translation.fr: Imagine, on est sur la plage,les pontes du secteur

translation.en: -are listening to your song-- -Yes.
Yes, easy for you to say 'cause it's not your song.
translation.fr: Facile à dire pour toi,c'est pas ta chanson.

translation.en: What if it doesn't go well? Then I'm a joke.
translation.fr: Et si ça foire ?Je serai la risée de tous.

translation.en: But you won't be.
Because you are gonna show them what I've known since I was 12 years old.
translation.fr: Car tu vas leur montrerce que je sais depuis que j'ai 12 ans,

translation.en: And that is that you are a star.
translation.fr: c'est-à-dire que tu es une star.

translation.en: This is the moment that we moved to Miami for.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'on est venus ici.

translation.en: We're supposed to be there.
Going to this party?
It's our destiny.
-Yeah! -Now you're talking.
-Time to work your charm. -I got this.
translation.fr: - C'est à toi de jouer.- Je gère.

translation.en: You got this. You're a big, strong man.
translation.fr: Tu gères. T'es le plus fort.

translation.en: Listen, you probably get this every night, but it's just like,
translation.fr: Vous devez entendre ça tous les soirs,

translation.en: literally just me and my beautiful friends--
translation.fr: mais je suis justeavec mes charmants amis…

translation.en: Santi? Love your video, man.
[in English] Come right in.
Wait. Stop right there.
We just gotta not be too conspicuous and blend in.
translation.fr: On n'attire pas l'attention,on se fond.

translation.en: Holy fuck. Is that Jon Z?
translation.fr: Putain. C'est pas Jon Z, lui ?

translation.en: [Ness] Oh, shit.
And is that Brray?
Nah. Everyone is at this party. I gotta go talk to them, Ness.
translation.fr: Y a tout le monde à cette soirée.Faut que je leur parle.

translation.en: What? No, that's the opposite of what I said.
translation.fr: C'est l'inversede ce que je viens de dire.

translation.en: -It's my destiny! -No. [sputters]
I don't think he knows what conspicuous means.
translation.fr: Il se fond un peu trop bien.

translation.en: Santi?
-How did you-- -What's up? We figured it out.
translation.fr: - Comment…- Ça va ? On a concrétisé.

translation.en: -You did. -You said earlier
you're most interested in people who figure things out.
translation.fr: que vous aimez les gens qui concrétisent.

translation.en: So Ness, she figured some stuff out and here we are.
translation.fr: Ness a concrétisé quelques trucspour nous, et nous voilà.

translation.en: -Here you are. -[Ness] Here we are.
What's new with you?
-Nothing since today. -Good.
translation.fr: - Rien depuis tout à l'heure.- Cool.

translation.en: I wanna introduce to you the next big thing in reggaeton.
translation.fr: Je vous présentela prochaine star du reggaeton.

translation.en: My friend, mi hermano, con ustedes, Javier Luna!
translation.fr: Mon ami, mi hermano,con ustedes, Javier Luna !

translation.en: We signed Javier Luna couple of months ago.
translation.fr: On a signé Javier Lunail y a deux mois.

translation.en: He's great, right?
I never heard of him.
You know, that could be you up there.
All right, guys, have fun.
I'm gonna go out and mingle.
You guys are really here.
What kind of look was that?
Was that like, "I respect your hustle" look
or was that, "you super overstepped" look?
That was good. That was a good look.
No, it was bad.
I'm gonna get a drink.
I need to know something.
You started pushing being independent at the meeting,
translation.fr: Au RDV, t'as insistépour qu'on se lance en indé,

translation.en: sort of out of nowhere, and honestly, I look around at this party
translation.fr: c'est sorti de nulle part,mais quand je regarde cette fête,

translation.en: and it doesn't seem that terrible.
translation.fr: ça n'a pas l'air si terrible.

translation.en: Signing a deal with Mia, if it's a good one,
is the best thing.
-Right. -And I hope that
she does offer it.
And I hope that we didn't actually fuck it up today. I just… [laughs]
translation.fr: qu'on n'a pas tout gâché aujourd'hui,mais…

translation.en: You clearly vibed with her.
Right? And professionally,
she is the better version of what I'm supposed to be,
translation.fr: elle représente tout le sérieuxque je devrais avoir.

translation.en: and I don't know, I bet everything on this too,
translation.fr: J'ai tout misé là-dessus, moi aussi,

translation.en: and I just kept seeing this thing in my head of me getting pushed out.
translation.fr: et j'ai peur de finirpar me faire écarter.

translation.en: Of course, I think she's cool and she knows her shit,
translation.fr: Oui, je la trouve cool,elle en connaît un rayon,

translation.en: but, like, you're like my fucking sister, bro.
translation.fr: mais toi, t'es comme ma sœur.

translation.en: I'm still at home working for my parents if it's not for you.
translation.fr: Sans toi, je serais toujourschez mes parents.

translation.en: You see things that I don't,
translation.fr: Tu vois ce que je vois pas

translation.en: in people, in situations, in myself.
translation.fr: chez les gens,dans les situations, chez moi.

translation.en: So, I mean, what are you seeing right now?
translation.fr: Alors, qu'est-ce que tu vois, là ?

translation.en: Dímelo, ¿qué tú quieres hacer? You wanna go?
What are you feeling?
I guess I'm feeling like, I mean, it is a party,
translation.fr: Je pense qu'on est à une soirée,

translation.en: and we are in Miami.
And there are a lot of cuties here we can talk to.
translation.fr: et qu'il y a plein de meufs joliesà qui parler.

translation.en: Throw on your Ness swag
and go bag yourself a cutie, okay?
translation.fr: et va te serrer une jolie fille,d'accord ?

translation.en: -You want me to wingman you? -No, I do not.
translation.fr: - Tu veux que je t'aide ?- Non, merci.

translation.en: Uh, Mr. Z y Mr. Brray.
I mean, I don't even know what to call you.
translation.fr: Je sais même pas comment vous appeler.

translation.en: Papi, just call me Bambi, Bambini,
Bamburrio, Bamvicio, el alma de la fiesta, or Brray, bro.
translation.fr: Bamburrio, Bamvicio,el alma de la fiesta, ou juste Bryan, mec.

translation.en: A'ight, I'mma just stick with Brray. [laughs]
translation.fr: Bon, je vais rester sur Brray.

translation.en: Yo, listen, I just wanna say that, like,
translation.fr: Écoutez, je voulais juste vous dire

translation.en: I'm a huge fan of your work
translation.fr: que je suis un grand fan

translation.en: and I think that you guys are just incredible, man.
translation.fr: et que je vous trouve géniaux.

translation.en: Where do I know you from, bro?
I'm a reggaeton artist. My name is Santi.
translation.fr: Je fais du reggaeton.Je m'appelle Santi.

translation.en: Oh, yeah… El video ese de "Exagerao."
-"Exagerao." -That's a banger, bro.
-You got real talent. -Thank you, bro. You, too.
translation.fr: - T'as du talent.- Merci, mec, toi aussi.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
[all] It's destiny!
Yo! It's his song! It's his song!
We're getting a record deal, baby!
What's up?
It was a good look, guys.
Oscar Morales's office.
No, this is his assistant, Mia.
Okay, I'll pass that message along. Okay, bye.
translation.fr: Je lui ferai passer le message. Au revoir.

translation.en: [Oscar] Mia, my coffee, please! And where's my dry-cleaning?
translation.fr: Mia, mon café !Et mes affaires du pressing ?

translation.en: It just got here.
